summary: Implements read‑only CKAN API actions for retrieving and searching catalog entities—including datasets, groups, organizations, users, tags, licenses, jobs, and configuration—while supporting pagination, autocomplete, follower statistics, and related metadata.
business_intent: Expose a set of safe, query‑only endpoints that allow external applications and internal services to discover, list, and inspect CKAN resources and system settings without altering any data.
